item.title: How to Install LEMP Stack on Manjaro
item.description: Hi all, in this video i will show how to full install LEMP (NGINX+MariaDB+PHP) on Manjaro. I hope you enjoy! Links Manjaro - Download MariaDB NGINX PHP Steps 1. NGINX $ sudo pacman -Syyu $ sudo pacman -S nginx $ sudo systemctl enable --now nginx $ sudo systemctl status nginx Check http://localhost in your browser to see default nginx page. 2. MariaDB $ sudo pacman -S mysql $ sudo mysql_install_db --user=mysql \ --basedir=/usr --datadir=/var/lib/mysql $ sudo systemctl enable --now mysqld $ sudo systemctl status mysqld $ mysql_secure_installation 3.
